plot: Young Vampire prince, from Vampire planet visits earth to see live performance of his favorite Idol contender, and remains stuck there with his three trusted and loyal servants. He then decides to join competition himself.
plot_en: Young Vampire prince, from Vampire planet visits earth to see live performance of his favorite Idol contender, and remains stuck there with his three trusted and loyal servants. He then decides to join competition himself.
plot_es: Young Vampire prince, from Vampire planet visits earth to see live performance of his favorite Idol contender, and remains stuck there with his three trusted and loyal servants. He then decides to join competition himself.
title: Vampire Idol
